name: Squarently (TheLandimizer)
description:
Squarently is a two-dimensional platformer game featuring a square as the protagonist! Don't underestimate the square just by looking at them, they can pack a punch!

___________________________________________________________________________

Squarently is extremely incomplete and is actively under development. If you have any suggestions, please let me know!

___________________________________________________________________________

Current Version: 0.1.0

___________________________________________________________________________

Features: (Most aren't complete!)
  • A full singleplayer adventure!
  • A similar, yet different, cooperative multiplayer adventure!
  • Online multiplayer with various things to do!
  • A level creator!
  • Tons of dangerous objects looking to kill you!
  • Multiple areas!
  • A hubworld that acts as a sandbox!
  • And so much more!

___________________________________________________________________________

I have multiple projects at the moment, and this most likely won't be my main focus. However, I will update it when I have time/when I feel like it! Thank you for stopping by!
